IConfidentialAssets","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"assetId","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint128","name":"","type":"uint128"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes","name":"proof","type":"bytes"}],"name":"claim","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"account","type":"address"}],"name":"confidentialBalanceOf","outputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"","type":"bytes32"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"confidentialTotalSupply","outputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"","type":"bytes32"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"to","type":"address"},{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"amount","type":"bytes32"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"data","type":"bytes"}],"name":"confidentialTransfer","outputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"","type":"bytes32"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"to","type":"address"},{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"amount","type":"bytes32"}],"name":"confidentialTransfer","outputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"","type":"bytes32"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"from","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"to","type":"address"},{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"amount","type":"bytes32"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"data","type":"bytes"}],"name":"confidentialTransferFrom","outputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"","type":"bytes32"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"from","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"to","type":"address"},{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"amount","type":"bytes32"}],"name":"confidentialTransferFrom","outputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"","type":"bytes32"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"decimals","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint8","name":"","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"amount","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"proof","type":"bytes"}],"name":"deposit","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"holder","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"spender","type":"address"}],"name":"isOperator","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"name","outputs":[{"internalType":"string","name":"","type":"string"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"operator","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint48","name":"until","type":"uint48"}],"name":"setOperator","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes","name":"pubkey","type":"bytes"}],"name":"setPublicKey","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"symbol","outputs":[{"internalType":"string","name":"","type":"string"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes","name":"encryptedAmount","type":"bytes"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"proof","type":"bytes"}],"name":"withdraw","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"ERC-7984 compliant wrapper around the Confidential Assets precompile. This contract wraps a specific asset from the multi-asset Confidential Assets precompile and exposes it as an ERC-7984 compliant confidential token. The wrapper: - Binds to a specific asset ID at deployment - Translates ERC-7984 calls to precompile calls - Manages operator approvals (time-limited delegations) - Handles the `data` parameter as ZK proofs for transfers Note: The ERC-7984 `bytes32 amount` parameter is interpreted as a commitment/handle. The actual encrypted amount and proof must be passed via the `data` parameter.","errors":{"InvalidData()":[{"details":"Error thrown when data parameter is invalid"}],"ReceiverRejected()":[{"details":"Error thrown when receiver rejects the transfer"}],"Unauthorized()":[{"details":"Error thrown when caller is not authorized"}]},"events":{"AmountDisclosed(bytes32,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when an encrypted amount is disclosed.","params":{"amount":"The plaintext amount that was disclosed","handle":"The encrypted amount pointer that was disclosed"}},"ConfidentialTransfer(address,address,bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when a confidential transfer occurs.","params":{"amount":"The encrypted amount pointer","from":"The sender address (zero address for mints)","to":"The recipient address (zero address for burns)"}},"OperatorSet(address,address,uint48)":{"details":"Emitted when an operator is set or unset.","params":{"holder":"The token holder who set the operator","operator":"The operator address","until":"The timestamp until which the operator is valid (0 to revoke)"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"claim(bytes)":{"details":"Claims pending confidential deposits.","params":{"proof":"The ZK proof containing transfer IDs to claim"}},"confidentialBalanceOf(address)":{"details":"Returns the encrypted balance of an account.","params":{"account":"The address to query"},"returns":{"_0":"The encrypted balance as a bytes32 pointer"}},"confidentialTotalSupply()":{"details":"Returns the encrypted total supply of tokens.","returns":{"_0":"The encrypted total supply as a bytes32 pointer"}},"confidentialTransfer(address,bytes32)":{"details":"This variant requires the caller to have previously submitted the encrypted amount and proof via a separate transaction or mechanism. For full functionality, use the variant with `data` parameter.","params":{"amount":"The encrypted amount pointer","to":"The recipient address"},"returns":{"_0":"The actual transferred amount pointer"}},"confidentialTransfer(address,bytes32,bytes)":{"details":"The `data` parameter must be ABI-encoded as: (bytes encryptedAmount, bytes proof) where encryptedAmount is exactly 64 bytes.","params":{"amount":"The encrypted amount pointer","data":"Additional data (e.g., ZK proof)","to":"The recipient address"},"returns":{"_0":"The actual transferred amount pointer"}},"confidentialTransferFrom(address,address,bytes32)":{"details":"This variant requires the caller to have previously submitted the encrypted amount and proof via a separate transaction or mechanism.","params":{"amount":"The encrypted amount pointer","from":"The sender address","to":"The recipient address"},"returns":{"_0":"The actual transferred amount pointer"}},"confidentialTransferFrom(address,address,bytes32,bytes)":{"details":"The caller must be an authorized operator for `from`. The `data` parameter must be ABI-encoded as: (bytes encryptedAmount, bytes proof)","params":{"amount":"The encrypted amount pointer","data":"Additional data (e.g., ZK proof)","from":"The sender address","to":"The recipient address"},"returns":{"_0":"The actual transferred amount pointer"}},"constructor":{"details":"Initializes the wrapper for a specific asset.","params":{"_assetId":"The asset ID from the Confidential Assets precompile","tokenDecimals":"The token decimals (use 0 to fetch from precompile)","tokenName":"The token name (use empty string to fetch from precompile)","tokenSymbol":"The token symbol (use empty string to fetch from precompile)"}},"decimals()":{"details":"Returns the number of decimals used for display purposes."},"deposit(uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Deposits public tokens into confidential balance (shielding).","params":{"amount":"The amount to deposit","proof":"The ZK proof for the deposit"}},"isOperator(address,address)":{"details":"Returns whether an operator is authorized for a holder.","params":{"holder":"The token holder","spender":"The potential operator"},"returns":{"_0":"True if the spender is an authorized operator"}},"name()":{"details":"Returns the name of the token."},"setOperator(address,uint48)":{"details":"Authorizes an operator to transfer tokens on behalf of the caller.","params":{"operator":"The address to authorize","until":"The timestamp until which the authorization is valid"}},"setPublicKey(bytes)":{"details":"Sets the public key for the caller to receive confidential transfers. This is required before receiving any confidential transfers.","params":{"pubkey":"The ElGamal public key (64 bytes)"}},"symbol()":{"details":"Returns the symbol of the token."},"withdraw(bytes,bytes)":{"details":"Withdraws confidential balance to public tokens (unshielding).","params":{"encryptedAmount":"The encrypted amount (64 bytes)","proof":"The ZK proof for the withdrawal"}}},"stateVariables":{"PRECOMPILE":{"details":"The Confidential Assets precompile address"},"RECEIVER_MAGIC":{"details":"Magic value returned by IERC7984Receiver.onConfidentialTokenReceived"},"_decimals":{"details":"Token decimals (cached from precompile or set at deployment)"},"_name":{"details":"Token name (cached from precompile or set at deployment)"},"_operators":{"details":"Operator approvals: holder => operator => expiry timestamp"},"_symbol":{"details":"Token symbol (cached from precompile or set at deployment)"},"assetId":{"details":"The asset ID this wrapper is bound to"}},"title":"ERC7984ConfidentialToken","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/ERC7984ConfidentialToken.sol":"ERC7984ConfidentialToken"},"evmVersion":"shanghai","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"contracts/ERC7984ConfidentialToken.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe070b36fddc7415b469082ad4dc702465838c15e8eaf4b673ad4a56b02a5d0fc","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://caafe8b1144d86ed1a39768aa7224f8cd97c22ec14c4d822d0b430822c015ca5","dweb:/ipfs/QmdAVKfQTwDDq7pm7smKEJ7AJViGQskXiYmppMUp1jmiaQ"]},"contracts/interfaces/IConfidentialAssets.sol":{"keccak256":"0x45e3ba9bf630a271c92c0a258717c5382975eb0a94b6672e295bf972cdc4d3ed","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://68c90d15441706848d6c18fa4a24a9ef51b3a68932e37dc2886cf49c7154f76b","dweb:/ipfs/QmcX7FR4DczP73wA2FCDJyS2SWS8dEph6SBqBGRhAcLryR"]},"contracts/interfaces/IERC7984.sol":{"keccak256":"0xad3297c58a1bbbc14a7995ec7ac791a90b2f137519c0a5952da14cb804103cc8","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://585e459468a1bafc7a70e23de543fbe4b37113031760ecdf74e3a65a97aa0f70","dweb:/ipfs/QmeyufipbkMZTBn4F3QiW4ox6x2b52q9tipb1X1nGEDjv7"]}},"version":1}

params.proof: The ZK proof containing transfer IDs to claim

confidentialBalanceOf(address).details: Returns the encrypted balance of an account.

returns._0: The encrypted balance as a bytes32 pointer

confidentialTotalSupply().details: Returns the encrypted total supply of tokens.

returns._0: The encrypted total supply as a bytes32 pointer

confidentialTransfer(address,bytes32).details: This variant requires the caller to have previously submitted the encrypted amount and proof via a separate transaction or mechanism. For full functionality, use the variant with `data` parameter.

confidentialTransfer(address,bytes32,byt.details: The `data` parameter must be ABI-encoded as: (bytes encryptedAmount, bytes proof) where encryptedAmount is exactly 64 bytes.

confidentialTransferFrom(address,address.details: This variant requires the caller to have previously submitted the encrypted amount and proof via a separate transaction or mechanism.
The caller must be an authorized operator for `from`. The `data` parameter must be ABI-encoded as: (bytes encryptedAmount, bytes proof)

constructor.details: Initializes the wrapper for a specific asset.

params._assetId: The asset ID from the Confidential Assets precompile
params.tokenDecimals: The token decimals (use 0 to fetch from precompile)
params.tokenName: The token name (use empty string to fetch from precompile)
params.tokenSymbol: The token symbol (use empty string to fetch from precompile)

decimals().details: Returns the number of decimals used for display purposes.

deposit(uint256,bytes).details: Deposits public tokens into confidential balance (shielding).

params.proof: The ZK proof for the deposit

isOperator(address,address).details: Returns whether an operator is authorized for a holder.

returns._0: True if the spender is an authorized operator

name().details: Returns the name of the token.

setOperator(address,uint48).details: Authorizes an operator to transfer tokens on behalf of the caller.

params.until: The timestamp until which the authorization is valid

setPublicKey(bytes).details: Sets the public key for the caller to receive confidential transfers. This is required before receiving any confidential transfers.

symbol().details: Returns the symbol of the token.

withdraw(bytes,bytes).details: Withdraws confidential balance to public tokens (unshielding).

params.proof: The ZK proof for the withdrawal
